title: Into the West (2005) 4of6 UNCUT TV Mini-Series
description:
Into the West (2005) 4/6
Hell on Wheels

First aired: 7/8/2005

The race is on as the Central Pacific and Union Pacific Railroads lay down track across the U.S. bringing east and west together. Jacob Wheeler&#039;s one son, Abe, joins the railroad crew, while his other son Jacob Jr. becomes a scout for the army. Jacob&#039;s daughter Margaret and her photographer husband are captured by the Cheyenne, but her Lakota heritage saves them and they are adopted by the tribe. When the village is attacked by overzealous U.S. soldiers, many are murdered. Witnessing the brutality, Margaret decides to stay with her Cheyenne family.
Writer: Kirk Ellis, William Mastrosimone
Director: Michael W. Watkins

This is part 4 of 6 of the original UNCUT TV mini-series. The DVD release was censored. This is a high quality TV rip of the UNCENSORED series.
